name: Small Town
description: A charming, peaceful town surrounded by lush greenery and a sparkling river.

children.name: Town Square
children.description: A bustling central gathering place for the townspeople, featuring a beautiful fountain and benches.

children.name: Fountain
children.description: An intricately designed marble fountain with water gracefully flowing from the top.

children.name: Benches
children.description: A set of wooden benches, perfect for relaxing and people watching.

children.name: Cafe Delight
children.description: A cozy, popular cafe known for its delicious pastries and aromatic coffee.

children.name: Counter
children.description: A long wooden counter displaying an array of cakes, pastries, and sandwiches.

children.name: Cappuccino
children.description: A hot, frothy cappuccino with a delicate heart-shaped design.

children.name: Croissant
children.description: A golden, flaky croissant filled with rich almond paste.

children.name: Tables
children.description: A set of round tables with comfortable cushioned chairs.

children.name: Menu
children.description: A printed menu featuring the cafe's selection of food and beverages.

children.name: Riverside Park
children.description: A picturesque park along the river, complete with walking paths, playground, and picnic areas.

children.name: Playground
children.description: A fun playground with swings, slides, and climbing structures for children to enjoy.

children.name: Swings
children.description: A set of swings with sturdy metal chains and comfortable rubber seats.

children.name: Slide
children.description: A tall, smooth slide with a gentle slope for a safe and enjoyable ride.

children.name: Picnic Area
children.description: A lovely picnic area with tables and barbecue grills overlooking the river.

children.name: Picnic Table
children.description: A sturdy wooden picnic table with attached benches on both sides.

children.name: Barbecue Grill
children.description: A large, clean charcoal grill available for public use.

children.description: An extensive wine list featuring a selection of the finest wines from around the world.

children.description: A grand hall with towering bookshelves, long wooden tables, and cozy reading nooks.
